ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend the course to a student interested in a basic overview of issues in global justice. I would recommend it particularly on the basis of the high quality discussion we had. This means it would suit in particular those who enjoy sharing their ideas with other students. I'd say it was an extremely interesting course to have taken.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course deepened my knowledge of the area of global justice and political philosophy. In addition, it provided the opportunity for me to see how other disciplines approach questions that philosophers too are interested in, and to learn both from and about their different methods.
